e4e0d4f214a23e6ab2debbe39fdf34f8e0b7522d.commit.message:
LDAP support for user databases, authentication and authorization has landed in the trunk. It has been tested with Active Directory and OpenLDAP, and is customizable for other LDAP servers. See jspwiki.properties for more details. Note that a user-accessible way of configuring the "Keychain" for storing bind DN passwords is still not available, but will be coming soon in a revamped installer screen. LdapLoginModule was removed, because it's actually much cleaner to use the UserDatabaseLoginModule instead.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@806031 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
e4e0d4f214a23e6ab2debbe39fdf34f8e0b7522d.commit.author.name: Andrew R. Jaquith

6deb486d8bcf792a066968683a9f6564990cbf08.commit.message:
Checked in LdapUserDatabase, and refactorings to other LDAP classes. The LdapUserDatabase is read-only. ProfileTab will respect this will print, rather than allow edits to, user profile information as a result. Any UserDatabase can now be flagged as "read-only" (via jspwiki.properties) to achieve the same effect.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@804457 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

d4742deca4131db6ae014dd11f1a65aa00696cec.commit.message:
Checked in revised LdapLoginModule and LdapAuthorizer. Notable new features include provisional support for Active Directory, which "mostly" works. I also added the ability to bind to LDAP with a specified identity. To to this, we use a new feature of freshcookies-security called a "keychain" that stores the binding DN in an password-locked, triple-DES encrypted file. The keychain is available via AuthenticationManager.getKeychain() and can be used for storage of anything sensitive. The keychain is NOT required to be unlocked at startup time (although obviously LDAP binds will fail). We will provide the ability for the admin to unlock the keychain via the web UI in a future build.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@802426 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
